name: Falkor Glass Table Lamp - Black
description: Made by highly skilled glassworkers, this incredibly textured spotted table lamp takes statement lighting to a new level. To make the Falkor, a layer of black glaze is applied over a layer of white. The top layer is then carefully pared back until only a few black circles remain. This complex process likens the lamp to a dragon's egg, which is why we named it after a famous fictional mythical creature. Polka dots have such a timeless feel about them and we love the textured surface of this lamp.
